verses.text_plain: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
verses.verse_html: 1Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.

verses.text_plain: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
verses.verse_html: 2Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.

verses.text_plain: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.
verses.verse_html: 3For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.

verses.text_plain: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
verses.verse_html: 4Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.

tokens.text: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned

verses.text_plain: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
verses.verse_html:
5Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me. ▼
▼ conceive…: Heb. warm me

footnotes.body_html: ▼ conceive…: Heb. warm me

verses.text_plain: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
verses.verse_html: 6Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

tokens.text: thou shalt make me to know

verses.text_plain: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
verses.verse_html: 7Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.

tokens.text: me, and I shall be whiter

verses.text_plain: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
verses.verse_html: 8Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.

verses.text_plain: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
verses.verse_html: 9Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.

verses.text_plain: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
verses.verse_html:
10Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me. ▼
▼ right: or, constant

verses.text_plain: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.
verses.verse_html: 11Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.

verses.text_plain: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
verses.verse_html: 12Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.

verses.text_plain: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 13Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.

verses.text_plain: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.
verses.verse_html:
14Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness. ▼
▼ bloodguiltiness: Heb. bloods

verses.text_plain: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.
verses.verse_html: 15O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.

verses.text_plain: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.
verses.verse_html:
16For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering. ▼
▼ else…: or, that I should

footnotes.body_html: ▼ else…: or, that I should

verses.text_plain: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
verses.verse_html: 17The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

verses.text_plain: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 18Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
verses.verse_html: 19Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
